english_translation: Regarding His saying, Mighty and Majestic: "The fuel of the fire will be people and stones" (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:24), it is said: Stones of sulfur. Ibn Mas'ud said: Red sulfur. Regarding His saying: "And they will be given therein fruit of similar kind" (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:25), it is said: Similar in color and different in taste. Regarding His saying: "Therein will they have spouses, purified" (Surah An-Nisa 4:57), it is said: They will not menstruate, defecate, blow their noses, or purify themselves.

english_translation: From Salem ibn Abi Hafsa, from a man, from Ibn Abbas, he said: Verily Allah, Mighty and Majestic, extracted Adam from Paradise before He created him. Then he recited: "Indeed, I am about to place a regent on the earth" (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:30). Regarding His saying: "And we celebrate Your praise and glorify You" (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:30), it is said: We glorify You and magnify You. The companions of Abdullah used to recite it: "So the Satan caused them both to slip" regarding His saying: "And fulfill My covenant, so I will fulfill your covenant" (Surah Al-Baqarah 2:40), it is said: With My command. I will fulfill your covenant with what I commanded you.
